tournament.name: South America Magic Series - Regional Championship

decks.notes: The deck revolves around using cards like Grief, Oliphaunt, and Architects of Will to disrupt the opponent's hand and set up for a combo finish with Living End. Shardless Agent, Subtlety, and Street Wraith provide additional disruption and card draw, while Generous Ent and Curator of Mysteries help dig for combo pieces. Waker of Waves and Thundering Falls provide additional threats. Force of Negation protects the combo, while Violent Outburst is used to cascade into Living End. The mana base includes fetch lands and various dual lands to support the deck's color requirements.

This deck focuses on using control elements to manipulate the battlefield and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It includes cards like Counterspell, Supreme Verdict, and Narset, Parter of Veils to control the pace of the game. The key card in the deck is The One Ring, which allows the player to generate value and outlast their opponent. The deck also utilizes a mix of lands and mana sources to ensure smooth gameplay and access to the necessary resources. Overall, the goal of this deck is to maintain control and ultimately emerge victorious.

The main focus of this deck is to mill the opponent's library as quickly and efficiently as possible, using cards like Ruin Crab, Hedron Crab, and Glimpse the Unthinkable. The deck also includes control elements like Drown in the Loch and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Surgical Extraction is included to remove crucial cards from the opponent's deck. The deck aims to win by emptying the opponent's library and forcing them to draw on an empty deck, leading to a victory through decking out.
